post:
Hello LET,

Renegade Networks offers high quality dedicated servers at a very competitive price.  We always try to help our customers to the best of our abilities, no matter what kind of price you are paying.  With 24x7 support, there will always be someone around the hour to answer your questions.  Our servers are located in Berkeley Springs, West Virginia making it a unique location that we have yet to see on LET.  Without any further ado, here is our first offer for the LET community.

<pre>
Dual Intel Xeon L5420
8 Cores @ 2.5Ghz
16GB Ram
1TB SATA HDD
1Gbps Network Speed
10TB Out-Going Bandwidth (Free Incoming!)
Berkeley Springs, WV
$30/month
<a href="https://renegadenetworks.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=WXJY8Q259V">Order</a>
</pre>

<pre>
Dual Intel Xeon L5640
12 Cores @ 2.2Ghz
48GB Ram
1TB SATA HDD
1Gbps Network Speed
10TB Out-Going Bandwidth (Free Incoming!)
Berkeley Springs, WV
$49/month
<a href="https://renegadenetworks.net/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=5&promocode=CQMCDW7FB5">Order</a>
</pre>


**When can I expect my server to be online?**<br />
Once you pass our fraud screening, you can expect your dedicated server to be online within 1-3 days.

**Do you have a test IP?**<br />
199.15.252.242

**What payment methods do you take?** <br />
Currently, we only accept payments via PayPal on our order form.  If you'd like to pay via BTC, please open a ticket.

**Do you offer refunds?** <br />
You may request a refund within 24 hours of your order.


If you have any other questions, please feel free to ask or open a ticket.

Skype: renegadenetworks.net
